									Philadelphia Eagles						

	


	
		Philadelphia Eagles file trademark for use of ‘Kelly Green'	

				

	
					By Emily Rose Grassi							•
					
									
					Published November 8, 2023						•
					Updated on November 8, 2023 at 4:14 pm				
						

	
			
			
		
	
	
			
			
		
	
	

	

		

	

		
		
			
				
	
		
	

	
									
									
					
The Philadelphia Eagles have filed to trademark "Kelly Green," as first reported by the Philadelphia Business Journal.


In the filing, the team is looking to trademark the use of the term "Kelly Green" in reference to professional football. 


It will cover "the categories of education and entertainment services," the application reads. The term would be trademarked during anything "providing sports and entertainment information via a global computer network or a commercial on-line computer service or by cable, satellite, television and radio."


Trademark attorney Josh Gerben announced the application on social media. 


	

	Get Philly local news, weather forecasts, sports and entertainment stories to your inbox. Sign up for NBC Philadelphia newsletters.




The Philadelphia Eagles have filed a trademark application for:

"KELLY GREEN"

The filing, made by the @Eagles on October 31st, seeks protection of the phrase "KELLY GREEN" (not the color) as it relates to a football team.#FlyEaglesFly #KellyGreen pic.twitter.com/ckTezZL1Ql
— Josh Gerben (@JoshGerben) November 6, 2023



The trademark filing is currently "awaiting examination," according to the application website. 


The Eagles posted a new collab with Mitchell & Ness of a recreation of the iconic '90s Eagles Letterman jacket that was famously worn by Princess Diana on Wednesday on Instagram.


	

	

					
			
				
											
														
						

													
						
															


				
					
													fashion
																			
								Nov 8

<div class="article-header--wrap ">
	<h1 class="article-headline">
		Philadelphia Eagles file trademark for use of ‘Kelly Green'	</h1>

				
<div class="article-meta" data-component="articleMeta">
	<h4 class="article-byline">
					By <a href="https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/author/emily-rose-grassi-8/" target="_blank">Emily Rose Grassi</a>							<span class="meta-dot">•</span>
					
									<span class="time-wrap">
					<time class="entry-date published" datetime="2023-11-08T21:14:45-05:00">Published November 8, 2023</time>						<span class="meta-dot">•</span>
					<time class="entry-date updated" datetime="2023-11-08T16:14:57-05:00">Updated on <span class="date">November 8, 2023</span> at <span class="time">4:14 pm</span></time>				</span>
						</h4>

	<div class="share-buttons" data-component="sharingBar">
			<a href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nbcphiladelphia.com%2Fnews%2Flocal%2Feagles-file-trademark-for-kelly-green%2F3690476%2F&Philadelphia%20Eagles%20file%20trademark%20for%20use%20of%20%E2%80%98Kelly%20Green%27?_osource=db_npd_nbc_wcau_fb_shr" data-service="facebook" target="_blank">
			<span class="icon icon-facebook-f"></span>
		</a>
	
	
			<a href="mailto:?body=Philadelphia%20Eagles%20file%20trademark%20for%20use%20of%20%E2%80%98Kelly%20Green%27%0D%0A%0D%0Ahttps%3A%2F%2Fwww.nbcphiladelphia.com%2Fnews%2Flocal%2Feagles-file-trademark-for-kelly-green%2F3690476%2F?_osource=db_npd_nbc_wcau_eml_shr" data-service="email" target="_blank">
			<span class="icon icon-envelope"></span>
		</a>
	
	</div>

	</div>

		</div>

	</div>

		<div class="section-content--full below-hero">
		<div class="section-content--primary">
			<div class="article-content--wrap">
				<figure class="article-featured-media">
	<div class="image-container">
		<img srcset="https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url=https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=320%2C180 320w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url= https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=400%2C225 400w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url= https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=500%2C281 500w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url= https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=600%2C338 600w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url= https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=850%2C478 850w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url= https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=1200%2C675 1200w, https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url=https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/local/eagles-file-trademark-for-kelly-green/3690476/" sizes="(max-width: 768px) 100vw, (max-width: 1200px) calc(100vw - 350px), 850px" src="https://sandbox.copyleaks.com/?url=https://media.nbcphiladelphia.com/2023/10/Kelly-green-is-back-Come-Sunday-the-Eagles-will-be-wearing-throwback-jerseys-on-the-field.jpg?quality=85&strip=all&resize=320%2C180" alt="Landon Dickerson and Jordan Mialata hold kelly green Eagles jerseys.">
	</div>

	</figure>
									<div class="article-content rich-text">
									
					
<p>The Philadelphia Eagles have filed to trademark "Kelly Green," as first reported by <a href="https://www.bizjournals.com/philadelphia/news/2023/11/06/eagles-kelly-green-trademark-throwback-uniforms.html" data-type="URL" data-id="https://www.bizjournals.com/philadelphia/news/2023/11/06/eagles-kelly-green-trademark-throwback-uniforms.html" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">the Philadelphia Business Journal</a>.</p>


<p>In the filing, the team is looking to trademark the use of the term "Kelly Green" in reference to professional football. </p>


<p>It will cover "the categories of education and entertainment services," <a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://uspto.report/TM/98247742" data-type="URL" data-id="https://uspto.report/TM/98247742" target="_blank">the application reads</a>. The term would be trademarked during anything "providing sports and entertainment information via a global computer network or a commercial on-line computer service or by cable, satellite, television and radio."</p>


<p>Trademark attorney Josh Gerben announced the application on social media. </p>

<div class="mobile-app-promotion">
	
<blockquote class="featured-text">
	<strong><em>Get Philly local news, weather forecasts, sports and entertainment stories to your inbox. <a href="https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/newsletters/?_osource=ed_npd_nbc_phi__newltrauto-signup-block" target="_blank">Sign up for NBC Philadelphia newsletters.</a></em></strong></blockquote>
</div>


<figure class="wp-block-embed is-type-rich is-provider-twitter wp-block-embed-twitter"><div class="wp-block-embed__wrapper">
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-width="500" data-dnt="true"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">The Philadelphia Eagles have filed a trademark application for:<br>
<br>
"KELLY GREEN"<br>
<br>
The filing, made by the <a href="https://twitter.com/Eagles?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">@Eagles</a> on October 31st, seeks protection of the phrase "KELLY GREEN" (not the color) as it relates to a football team.<a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/FlyEaglesFly?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">#FlyEaglesFly</a> <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/KellyGreen?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">#KellyGreen</a> <a href="https://t.co/ckTezZL1Ql" target="_blank">pic.twitter.com/ckTezZL1Ql</a></p>
— Josh Gerben (@JoshGerben) <a href="https://twitter.com/JoshGerben/status/1721603635216339364?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw" target="_blank">November 6, 2023</a></blockquote>
</div>
</figure>

<p>The trademark filing is currently "awaiting examination," according to the application website. </p>


<p>The <a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/sports/nfl/philadelphia-eagles/princess-diana-eagles-kelly-green-jacket/3690417/" data-type="URL" data-id="https://www.nbcphiladelphia.com/news/sports/nfl/philadelphia-eagles/princess-diana-eagles-kelly-green-jacket/3690417/" target="_blank">Eagles posted a new collab with Mitchell & Ness</a> of a recreation of the iconic '90s Eagles Letterman jacket that was famously worn by Princess Diana on Wednesday <a rel="noreferrer noopener" href="https://www.instagram.com/p/CzZITz0uOBl/?img_index=1" target="_blank">on Instagram</a>.</p>

<div class="recirc-module">
	<h3 class="recirc__heading"></h3>

	<p class="recirc__subheading"></p>

					<div class="recirc__post">
			<div class="post__wrap">
